amendment.description: Manager's amendment incorporates sundry clarifications with respect to the use of TARP funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-3 to make sundry clarifications with respect to the use of TARP funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 275 - 152 (Roll no. 19).
